form.PN:
samostalnik ali pridevnik izgovarjamo
/s@b*O*:dIn@1t/
, glagol pa
/s@b*O*:dIneIt/
.

sense.def:
Kdor je
someone's subordinate
, ima manj pomemben položaj v delovni organizaciji kot nekdo drug.

seg.quote: He humiliated his senior staff before their subordinates.
All other questions are subordinate to this one.

sense.def:
To subordinate one thing to another
pomeni obravnavati neko stvar kot manj pomembno od neke druge;

seg.quote: To keep his job, he subordinated his own interests to the objectives of the company.
